pkgmetadata.longdescription: Rhythmic Patterns Modeling by FMM Models // Provides a collection of functions to fit and explore single, multi-component and restricted Frequency Modulated Moebius (FMM) models. 'FMM' is a nonlinear parametric regression model capable of fitting non- sinusoidal shapes in rhythmic patterns. Details about the mathematical formulation of 'FMM' models can be found in Rueda et al. (2019) doi:10.1038/s41598-019-54569-1.
